puzzle.help: 1. Draw a path that crosses all gems and follows this rule: 2. Crossing two adjacent gems: 3. The line cannot cross two adjacent gems if they are of different color. 4. The line is free to either go straight or turn when crossing two adjacent gems of the same color. 5. Crossing a gem that is not adjacent to the last crossed: 6. The line should go straight in the space between two gems of the same colour. 7. The line should make a single 90 degree turn in the space between two gems of different colour.
